### _Shop_ and support these businesses with your dollars.

__

### _Refer_ a friend to scouted businesses.

__

### _Plan_ your next vacation with The Scout Guide.

__

### _Discover_ thriving small businesses in other cities.

__

### _Share_ the guide with friends, family, and neighbors.

__

### _Follow_ along socially for all things LOCAL.

##  Shop Our Latest Releases

## Join Us In Supporting Local

The Scout Guide is your resource for making meaningful connections with the
small businesses in your community and in places you visit across the country.
Use it in print and online to discover people worth meeting, stories worth
hearing, and businesses worth supporting.

Find Scouted businesses near you
